RankInformation.SkillsRating: This rating shows your skill strength in the platform. The rating depends on the number of solved problems, on the rating of contests and challenges.
RankInformation.ActivityRating: This rating shows your activity over the last 30 days. It depends on the number of kepcoins earned, daily logins and completed daily tasks.
RankInformation.Contests: This rating shows your strength in competitions.
RankInformation.Challenges: This rating shows your strength in challenges.
